BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to enter the Interstate Medical Licensure Compact, the Nurse Licensure Compact, and the Psychology Interjurisdictional Compact, to enhance the portability of medical and mental health providers to become licensed in multiple participating states.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Enter the Interstate Medical Licensure Compact, the Nurse Licensure Compact, and the Psychology Interjurisdictional Compact.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York State to subsidize the education and licensing costs of CUNY students who commit to working in the public sector in the mental health professions, which historically experience high turnover rates and staffing shortages.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - NYS to subsidize the education and licensing costs of CUNY students who commit to working in the public sector in the mental health professions, which historically experience high turnover rates and staffing sho

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Office of Mental Health to expand enforcement of mental health and substance use disorder insurance parity and apply for federal grants to enforce insurance parity.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - NYS Office of Mental Health to expand enforcement of mental health and substance use disorder insurance parity and apply for federal grants to enforce insurance parity.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State and Federal governments to expand the availability of mental health professionals for low and moderate income New Yorkers by increasing Medicaid reimbursement rates for behavioral health services.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Expand the availability of mental health professionals for low and moderate income New Yorkers by increasing Medicaid reimbursement rates for behavioral health services.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York State to reinitiate the NY/NY supportive housing program, to have both City and State coordinate on supportive housing development and contracting.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - New York State to reinitiate the NY/NY supportive housing program, to have both City and State coordinate on supportive housing development and contracting.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to a pilot program establishing community centers for individuals with severe mental illness in high-need areas
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Pilot program establishing community centers for individuals with severe mental illness in high-need areas.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to crisis respite centers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Crisis respite centers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing outreach and education regarding mental health services available through NYC Care and through the New York city health and hospitals corporation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Providing outreach and education regarding mental health services available through NYC Care and through the New York city health and hospitals corporation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on involuntary removals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Reporting on involuntary removals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the creation of a database and interactive map of outpatient mental health service providers in New York city
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Requiring the creation of a database and interactive map of outpatient mental health service providers in New York city.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the Federal Government to ensure that calls to the 988 Suicide and Crisis Lifeline program are routed based on geolocation rather than area code.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Ensure that calls to the 988 Suicide and Crisis Lifeline program are routed based on geolocation rather than area code.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign legislation to fully repeal the Institutions for Mental Diseases Exclusion from the Social Security Act to allow states to use federal Medicaid funding to provide mental health and substance use disorder treatment services to adult Medicaid beneficiaries at Institutions for Mental Diseases.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sign legislation to fully repeal the Institutions for Mental Diseases Exclusion from the Social Security Act.

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing outreach and education regarding mental health services available through NYC Care and through the New York city health and hospitals corporation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Reporting on involuntary removals.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mental Health Roadmap Legislative Package - Requiring the creation of a database and interactive map of outpatient mental health service providers in New York city.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
